questions.question: ‘The House-builder’ is a:
questions.answer: Story

questions.question: What was the house-builder’s job?
questions.answer: Carpenter

questions.question: Why did the house-builder build a poor-quality house?
questions.answer: Laziness and dishonesty

questions.question: Who was the house actually meant for?
questions.answer: The house-builder himself

questions.question: What mistake did the house-builder make?
questions.answer: He used poor materials

questions.question: What is the central message of the story?
questions.answer: Honesty in work

questions.question: How did the house-builder feel at the end?
questions.answer: Ashamed

questions.question: The story teaches us to be:
questions.answer: Honest

questions.question: What quality is criticised in the story?
questions.answer: Carelessness

questions.question: What happens when we are dishonest in our work?
questions.answer: Loss and regret

questions.question: ‘The House-builder’ is a:
questions.answer: Story

questions.question: What was the house-builder’s job?
questions.answer: Carpenter

questions.question: Why did the house-builder build a poor-quality house?
questions.answer: Laziness and dishonesty

questions.question: Who was the house actually meant for?
questions.answer: The house-builder himself

questions.question: What mistake did the house-builder make?
questions.answer: He used poor materials

questions.question: What is the central message of the story?
questions.answer: Honesty in work

questions.question: How did the house-builder feel at the end?
questions.answer: Ashamed

questions.question: The story teaches us to be:
questions.answer: Honest

questions.question: What quality is criticised in the story?
questions.answer: Carelessness

questions.question: What happens when we are dishonest in our work?
questions.answer: Loss and regret

questions.question: Why did the house-builder build the house carelessly?
questions.answer: He wanted to finish quickly and save effort, so he was dishonest.

questions.question: What was the biggest mistake made by the house-builder?
questions.answer: He used poor materials thinking the house was not for him.

questions.question: What lesson does the story teach?
questions.answer: We should always do our work honestly and sincerely.

questions.question: How did dishonesty affect the house-builder?
questions.answer: He suffered loss and regret when the house turned out to be his own.

questions.question: What moral message does the story convey?
questions.answer: Dishonesty in work ultimately harms oneself.
